venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
Come join your fellow Humanists at the Rifftrax live event at Blackstone Valley Cinemas in Millbury!

Time: 8pm to 10pm (Meet at 7:30 in theater lobby)
Dinner beforehand: 6:30pm at Q'doba

Info about the event here:

What is Rifftrax?
Remember Mystery Science Theater 3000? Rifftrax are spoofs of movies, created in the same way they used to do it on TV from the original MST3K crew - usually in a downloadable audio file, but at this event they are performing a "riff" of the classic exploitation film showing the "horros of marijuana use" LIVE over a multicast to theaters all over the country! This is the 3rd event of it's kind, and each time they prove to be hilarious. There will also be 5 old shorts from the 1950's spoofed.

Sample Rifftrax (click on the "watch sample" button on the right

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Humanist Excursion - Rifftrax Reefer Madness @ Blackstone Valley Cinema!
